TrackingImpactPredict.title: Reentry Predictions
TrackingImpactPredict.helpBody:
The Tracking and Impact Prediction (TIP) menu shows recent and upcoming satellite reentry predictions from the US Space Command.

Clicking on a row will select that satellite and change the time to the predicted decay time.
TrackingImpactPredict.dataSource: Tracking and Impact Prediction (TIP) messages provided by the US Space Command (USSPACECOM).
